doc.title: Sunset Riders
doc.plot: Four cowboys and lawmen Steve, Billy, Bob, and Cormano uphold peace in the old west. But one day, a band of outlaws come into town, they are: Simon Greedwell the millionaire, Hawkeye Hank Hatfield, Dark Horse who rides a horse that wears steel armor, The Smith Brothers (Not the guys who owned the vitamin company, these two are experts on dynamite and fire), El Greco (Not the artist but the Mexican bandit who snaps a mean whip), Chief Wigwam, Paco Loco, and Sir Richard Rose (The leader of the gang). Steve, Billy, Bob and Cormano must also blast a band of dozens and dozens of desperados and thieves along the way, whether riding horse back, on a train, or walking through town. Watch out for stampedes of cattle and flying bullets.
